response.overview: In this all female snowboard film, pro riders from around the world take you behind the white curtain. From Asia to North America, from the mountains to the coast, Float brings a one-of-a-kind, organic perspective to snowboard film-making while documenting the seasons of the most progressive women in the sport. Rider-driven and inspired by the spectacular natural environments that some of us are lucky enough to call our playgrounds, Float offers a truly unique -- and female -- perspective on the sport.
response.title: Float
